rooms.description: Spacious living area with Kerala-style wooden beams and traditional finishes. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall to maximize natural light.
Dedicated home theater space integrated into the living room area. Features acoustic panels and ambient lighting for a cinematic experience.
Modern Kerala kitchen with traditional stone accents, designed to ensure ample ventilation and efficient workspace. Includes floor-to-ceiling windows on the rear wall for cross-ventilation.
Adjacent dining area that seamlessly integrates with the kitchen and living room space. Enhanced natural light from adjoining windows.
Private bathroom adjacent to the main bedroom area for convenience, featuring traditional Kerala-style fixtures and efficient drainage system.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings. Positioned following Vastu guidelines to invite positive energy.
Large balcony window facing the north, providing ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
